memberdef.name: falloc_sample_block
ffree_sample_block
falloc_snd_list
memberdef.initializer: { \ if (!Qempty(snd_list_free)) \ Qget(snd_list_free, snd_list_type, sp) \ else \ sp = (snd_list_type)get_from_pool(round_size(sizeof(snd_list_node)));\ snd_list_used++; \ DBG_MEM_ALLOCATED(sp, who); \ }

memberdef.name: frelease_snd_list
memberdef.initializer: { \ sp->refcnt--; \ DBG_MEM_RELEASED(sp, who); \ if (sp->refcnt <= 0) { \ ffree_snd_list(sp, who); \ } \ }

memberdef.name: falloc_sound
ffree_sound
falloc_generic
falloc_generic_n
memberdef.initializer: { \ int min_size = sizeof(sptype) * (n); \ int size = round_size(min_size); \ falloc_generic_bytes(sp, sptype, size, who) }

memberdef.name: falloc_generic_bytes
ffree_generic
